CustomField.description: It represents the tier in which immunity is applied based on a subscription purchase. When a subscription is purchased the tier may be upgraded at the same time that immunity is applied. This will depend on the type of subscription purchase.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It represents the tier in which immunity is applied based on a subscription purchase. When a subscription is purchased the tier may be upgraded at the same time that immunity is applied. This will depend on the type of subscription purchase.
CustomField.label: Subscription Tier Immunity Level
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Loyalty Program Members (Subscription Tier Immunity Level)
